decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | The customer waiting room and reception room shall not be open to members of the public between the hours of 23:00 and 08:30 on any day.  It shall only be accessible to staff employed by the mini cab business during these hours.  REASON:  To protect the living conditions of neighbouring occupiers. | The orange flashing light attached to the front of the premises, shall be removed within 1 month of the date of this permission and not reinstated on any part of the building.  REASON:  To protect the living conditions of the neighbouring occupiers. | The aerial shall be removed should the approved use cease, or should it no longer be required for the operational purposes of the mini-cab firm.  REASON:  To protect the visual amenity of the area by removing unnecessary structures and equipment.
description: Continued use of retail shop as mini cab offices and retention of radio aerial
